EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_7_App_Note
EmailTemplate.subject: Keys to securing your VoLTE and VoWiFi deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Evolve your network to support VoLTE and VoWiFi VoLTE and VoWiFi are network must-haves – see how our SBC, DRA and AAA can help you secure your successful deployment.
In this application note, you will learn:
- The importance of VoLTE and VoWiFi - What is needed that these key functions provide - The benefits of deploying with Nokia using Secure Service Enablement
Leverage tier 1-quality solutions, fit for your network requirements Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
